question: A student is conducting an investigation on static electricity. The student has three balloons and rubs two of them on a piece of wool. The student then touches each balloon to a wall to observe if static electricity would cause the balloon to stick. What is the independent variable in this investigation?
candidate_answers: (A) the height of the wall (B) the number of balloons (C) the attraction to the wall (D) the rubbing action on the wool
label: C
